title: How to Add Desktop Wallpaper to Your Computer

steps.title: Find an image.
steps.content: Find an image. You can pull one off a search engine, an email, or a photo from your camera.

steps.title: Right click and save to your computer.
steps.content: Right click and save to your computer.

steps.title: Find your saved photo, right click it and press 'set as desktop background'.
steps.content: Find your saved photo, right click it and press 'set as desktop background'.

steps.title: Find an image, you can pull one of a search engine, or an email, or a photo from your camera.
steps.content: Find an image, you can pull one of a search engine, or an email, or a photo from your camera.

steps.title: Save the image to your hard disk.
steps.content: Save the image to your hard disk. You can do this by dragging it to your desktop in many cases.

steps.title: Open preferences on your mac and go to "Desktop & Screen Saver".
steps.content: Open preferences on your mac and go to "Desktop & Screen Saver".

steps.title: Press the + button in the lower left.
steps.content: Press the + button in the lower left. Select the image on your hard drive.
